author: Flo
content: I like these little Mini Coopers with their little wings emblems. This one seems to have lost an argument with something harder than its grill. Your point of view almost makes me, the viewer, think I may have been the one who won this little argument! Or did I? I seem to be sitting in the road. So perhaps my injuries are worse than the little Mini's are! When I get over the shock from the impact, I'll find out.
